DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics increase single dos AZD8683 administer via inhalation
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics Single Ascending Doses Inhaled AZD8683
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single Centre , Double-blind , Randomised , Placebo-controlled , Parallel-group Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics inhale AZD8683 Single Ascending Doses administer via Turbuhaler Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure Healthy male subject age 18 45 year suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture Male subject willing use barrier contraception ie , condom spermicide , day dose least 3 month dose investigational product Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg inclusive History presence gastrointestinal , pulmonary , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Abnormal vital sign , 10 minute supine rest , define follow : Systolic blood pressure > 140 mm Hg Diastolic blood pressure > 90 mm Hg Heart rate < 40 > 85 beat per minute Any clinically important abnormality rhythm , conduction morphology rest ECG . This include subject follow : PR ( PQ ) interval prolongation > 200 m drop beat ( single non conduct Pwaves ) base screen Prolonged QTcF > 450 m shorten QTcF < 340 m family history long QT syndrome
